Articles.Content: One of the founding fathers of rocketry was born today in 1894.
Well then Happy Birthday to the guy that makes me do transfer burns close to the object I'm orbiting for definetly good reason that I'm not so sure about what they are xD
Heh, happy late birthday. Same as above, makes me do burns close to a object for probably a very good reason. (i don't know why, i just do it)
It's because you're moving faster when closer to the body you're orbiting. So it takes less dV to get you to escape velocity.
Herman Oberth: Saving on Delta V since 1894
